result.execSummary:
The defendant Sergio L Ratliff was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse, Domestic Abuse Repeater], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Corrected  Judgment of Conviction signed and filed.  Changed Sentencing date on Count #6 from 09-11-2014 to 09-12-2014

Defendant Sergio L Ratliff in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M. Masnica.   Brian J. Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Court orders the following: 
Count 2:
- Total sentence: 6 year (Initial Confinement: 3 years, Extended Supervision: 3 years). CONSECUTIVE to 14CF165.  Credit for 96 days.
- Defendant IS NOT eligible for Challenge Incarceration
- Defendant IS NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program
- Court costs waived.
- DNA Surcharge waived.
- Conditions of Extended Supervision:  No contact with ex-wife.  No contact with minor children without 3rd party supervision.  Maintain full-time employment and/or school.  Maintain absolute sobriety/Random UAs.  No use or possession of alcohol/drug paraphernalia/drugs without a valid prescription.  Follow through with AODA treatment/counseling.  

Count 6:
- Total sentence: 1 year 6 months (Initial Confinement: 1 year, Extended Supervision: 6 months). CONSECUTIVE to Count 2 and 14CF165
- Defendant IS NOT eligible for Challenge Incarceration
- Defendant IS NOT eligible for Substance Abuse Program
- Court costs waived.
- DNA Surcharge waived.
- Conditions of Extended Supervision:  No contact with ex-wife.  Same as Count 2.
Filed by the Department of Corrections requesting an extension for the PSI due date. Approved by the Court, PSI due to the Court by September 8, 2014.
Sentencing hearing on September 12, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Sergio L Ratliff in court, in custody, with attorney Nicole M. Masnica.   Bryan C. Bayer appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Counts 2 and 6.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Counts 1, 3, 4 and 5 dismissed and read in.  Court orders presentence investigation to be completed and report filed within 30 days.  Court orders bail revoked.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for September 12, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
